name: Click Miner
summary: The game takes place on an 8x8 grid, representing a layer of top-soil, and you play as The Click Miner. Your task is to hunt/click for the Magic Square, helped by mystical Arrows Of Mystery. Upon discovering (/clicking) the Magic Square, the soil is dug up around the area, revealing another layer of... who knows what? Only YOU can discover, as you go Deeper and Deeper into the Clicking World Of Click Miner.
